set.name: DMBD-14 Chronicle Final Wars Deck: Dragheart Crimson Saga

property.name: Type
property.value: Dragheart Weapon

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever a creature equipped with this attacks, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution Human or a non-evolution Dragon, put it into the battle zone. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck. ■ A creature equipped with this can't be attacked. ■ Dragsolution: At the end of your turn, if you put a dragon in the battle zone this turn, you may flip this card to the dragheart fortress side. {HYPERSPATIAL DRAGHEART} ■ Dragsolution: At the start of your turn, if you have 2 or more fire creatures in the battle zone, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it. (At the start of your game, draghearts are put into your hyperspatial zone. If a creature equipped with it or the dragheart leaves the battle zone, return it there.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Victory Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-14 Chronicle Final Wars Deck: Dragheart Crimson Saga

property.name: Type
property.value: Dragheart Fortress

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever one of your Humans or fire Dragons attacks, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution Human or non-evolution Dragon, put it into the battle zone. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck. ■ Dragsolution: When you put a Dragon in the battle zone, if it's not the first Dragon put into the battle zone this turn, you may flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

(Equip it to this creature.) ■ When this creature would leave, you may return one of your draghearts to your hyperspatial zone instead.
